content: slip_stitch between current hexagon and the next one ch2 continue to next hexagon 40 for the last marked hexagon trtr w4 ch4 finish left edge 41 trtr w4 ch4 trtr w4 ch2 slip_stitch between current hexagon and the next one ch2 continue to next hexagon 2 times 42 trtr w3 ch2 trtr w3 ch1 slip_stitch between current hexagon and the next one ch1 continue to next hexagon 2 times 43 trtr w2 ch2 trtr w2 ch1 slip_stitch between current hexagon and the next one ch1 continue to next hexagon 2 times 44 trtr w1 ch2 trtr w1 ch1 slip_stitch between current hexagon and the next one ch1 continue to next hexagon black fasten_off yarn if you have questions or would like to share your finished item join the breakaway crochet method | support and chat on facebook copyright 2023 lisa hounshell 9
